In England, in the seven days to 19 August, there were 30,318 new confirmed cases (53.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 August, there were 40,485 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (10,167 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 August is 19,808,426 (35,028.1 cases per 100,000 population).
